publicationStmt.publisher: in Poules churche yarde by [T. Marsh for] Anthony Kytson,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption on A1r; imprint from colophon, actual printer and suggested publication date from STC.
A variant of the edition with Marsh's name in the colophon; first leaf is probably the first leaf of STC (2nd ed.) 23013 (cf. STC 2nd ed. -- "Tp verso line 2 from bottom: 'theym').
Imperfect; first leaf, pi1 is torn, affecting text.
Reproductions of the original in the Bodleian Library.
